```{r}
df <- read.table("../random/isorandom.out", header = FALSE, sep = "\t")
colnames(df) <- c("seq_len", "dons", "accs", "trials", "isoforms")
df$trials <- abs(df$trials)
head(df)
# don't forget the comma
# df[df$seq_len == 300,]
```
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
p <- df %>%
  ggplot(.,mapping = aes(x=seq_len, y=isoforms)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "nls", formula = y ~ a * exp(b * x), 
              se = FALSE, method.args = list(start = list(a = 0.1, b = 0.1))) +
  theme_minimal()

p
```

```{r}
d500 <- df[df$seq_len == 500,]
d500

p500 <- d500 %>%
  ggplot(.,aes(x=trials,y=isoforms)) +
  geom_point()

p500
```
```{r}
p2 <- df %>%
  ggplot(., aes(x=trials, y=isoforms, color=seq_len)) +
  geom_point()

p2
```
```{r}
boxp1 <- df %>%
  ggplot(., aes(x=seq_len, y=trials, group=seq_len)) +
  geom_boxplot()

boxp1
```
```{r}
boxp2 <- df %>%
  ggplot(., aes(x=seq_len, y=isoforms, group=seq_len)) +
  geom_boxplot()

boxp2
```
